Package assignment2

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BottomPanel
    BottomPanel: allows user to set the current time of the day and view all the trains.
    FileChooser
    FileChooser:Allows to choose a file using JFile Chooser
    FileReader
    FileReader: Class to read the file Seperate method for individual data files and spatial data file.
    FileWrite
    FileWriter: Class to the file.
    Main
    Main: setting the JFrame and all its components Instantiate all the objects required for project.
    Melbourne
    This is responsible for reading data files i.e fresmet.ini and its contains
    MetMap
    MetMap: Display all the trains and stations This has got paintComponent method for drawing all the trains
    PointMap
    PointMap:This is class is designed to do the mapping between given time and station name.
    PointMapDate
    PointMapData : SubClass of PointMap to convert the String time into date Format
    RailLine
    RailLine: Represent Each rail line of Melbourne.
    RailLines
    RailLines: Collection of RailLine needed to draw in MetMap.java
    ScreenPanel
    ScreenPanel: is the Screen for the Map.
    SelectedFile
    This is responsible for selecting the File availble by FileChooser (when JFileChooser popups).
    Station
    Station: Responsible for mapping between station name and its X and Y coordinates.
    TablePanel
    TablePanel: is the core to creating JTable
    TopPanel
    TopPanel : Responsible for zooming in and zooming out MetMap Panel
    Train
    Train: Stores all the information about a particular train like name, currentPosition coordinates, time when reaches at a particular station and its shape.
    TrainRunnable
    TrainRunnable: implements Thread functionality
    Trains
    Trains: Responsible for reading timetable data for each train and store each Train into arrayList of Train
